casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Burton, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Burton (1995), 73 Ohio St.3d 35.]

(No. 94-1648 Submitted April 24, 1995 Decided August 9, 1995.) Kevin Burton, pro se. Per Curiam.

We affirm the judgment of the court of appeals for the reasons stated in its judgment entry.

Judgment affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and Cook, JJ., concur.
